des: "These are gluten-free. You can substitute peanut butter for the almond butter. As an alternative to rolling the dough into balls, you can spread the dough in bottom of a baking dish and cut into bars. I upped the honey from 1/3 to 1/2 cup so they are more cohesive."
ins: Stir oats, coconut, honey, ground flax seeds, hemp seed hearts, chocolate chips, almond butter, and vanilla extract together in a bowl until combined. Roll dough into 3/4-inch balls and refrigerate until firm, about 2 hours.
